# pcaviz_groupmeans { #pybiber.BiberAnalyzer.pcaviz_groupmeans }

```python
BiberAnalyzer.pcaviz_groupmeans(pc=1, width=8, height=4, dpi=150)
```

Generate a scatter plot of the group means along 2 components.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                             | Default   |
|--------|--------|-----------------------------------------|-----------|
| pc     |        | The principal component for the x-axis. | `1`       |
| width  |        | The width of the plot.                  | `8`       |
| height |        | The height of the plot.                 | `4`       |
| dpi    |        | The resolution of the plot.             | `150`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description          |
|--------|--------|----------------------|
|        | Figure | A matplotlib figure. |
